title: 8 Quick Steps to Refund Fortnite Skins, Items, and Outfits

steps.title: Launch Fortnite.
steps.content: Launch Fortnite . You can refund or return purchases made in the Item Shop and get your V-Bucks back.

steps.title: Open the main menu.
steps.content: Open the main menu. In the newest update, this will be in the top-right corner of the lobby.

steps.title: Select the "Settings" icon.
steps.content: Select the "Settings" icon. This looks like a gear icon.

steps.title: Select Support and Refunds.
steps.content: Select Support and Refunds . You can find this underneath Reporting .

steps.title: Select Return or Cancel Purchase.
steps.content: Select Return or Cancel Purchase . A new page will open with a list of purchases eligible for a refund. Only items purchased with V-Bucks within 30 days can be refunded using a return ticket. If the item has been purchased within 24 hours and you haven't equipped the item in gameplay yet, you can cancel and refund without using a return ticket.

steps.title: Select Use Return Ticket.
steps.content: Select Use Return Ticket . This will be next to the item you want to refund. If you're canceling an item, you'll see Cancel next to the eligible item instead.

steps.title: Select Yes.
steps.content: Select Yes . This will confirm you want to use a Return Ticket. You can only have three (3) Return Tickets at one time. When you use a Return Ticket, you can earn a new one in 365 days.

steps.title: Select OK.
steps.content: Select OK . You'll see the amount of V-Bucks credited back to your account on the Success screen. [1] X Research source If the purchase was not made by you, you'll need to contact Epic Games or your console's platform support team.
